trans-unit.source: Run in isolated mode with randomized ports and isolated user secrets, allowing multiple instances to run simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 在隔離模式中搭配隨機化連接埠和隔離的使用者袐密執行，允許同時執行多個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A running instance of this AppHost was found and will be stopped. To run multiple isolated instances simultaneously, run from different directories such as git worktree directories.
trans-unit.target: 找到此 AppHost 的一個執行中執行個體，將會停止。若要同時執行多個隔離的執行個體，請從 git worktree 目錄等不同目錄執行。
